task.title: How to Make a Potato and Chorizo Breakfast Hash
task.shortdesc: Delicious and filling: the perfect combination!

step.cmd: Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic, chop the chorizo, dice up the cooked potato and finely chop the parsley.
Gently fry the onion and garlic in a little oil in an ovenproof pan until the onion is soft.
Add the chorizo and fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the potatoes and cook for 5 minutes more, then crack the eggs on top.
Transfer the pan to the preheated oven and bake for 8 minutes, or until the egg white is set but the yolk is still runny.
Sprinkle with sea salt, black pepper and the parsley, to serve.
